advertiser_name: Ann Pearl Rehabilitation & Healthcare - Ohana Pacific Health
ad_text: Ann Pearl Rehabilitation & Healthcare - Ohana Pacific Health Sponsored NOW HIRING: Health Information Manager / Assistant. Full time + Full benefits! Join our mission-driven Ohana; Apply Today! https://bit.ly/3GEfoMY *** DM your resume & contact info for immediate consideration. *** We're looking for a Health Information Assistant who strives to provide operational excellence and genuine care in a team environment. Our Health Information Management (HIM) Department is primarily responsible for: - Patient health records and ensure that needed health information is complete, accurate and available to legitimate users. - Protect patient privacy, provide information security, comply with standards and regulations regarding health information and administer health information computer systems. Requirements: - Minimum of 1 year in health information experience, in any healthcare setting. - Knowledge of ICD-10 and medical terminology. - Registered Health Information Technician (RHIT) preferred, but not required. The Benefits: - Paid Time Off (PTO) - Tuition Reimbursement & Scholarship Opportunities - Medical/Dental/Vision/401K - Excellent growth and advancement opportunities - Mission Driven Ohana & Dedicated Team Culture - Competitive pay and benefits #HawaiiJobs #HawaiiHealthcare #OneOhana #NowHiringHawaii FULL-TIME · KANEOHE, HAWAII Health Information Manager Apply now
